streams.name: Web Innovation
streams.description: The web develops faster then ever. Web browsers are becoming great platforms full of new APIs which bring brand new opportunities to offer to our customers. Imagine an application runs in a web browser and is capable of working offline and synchronizing its state once online. Imagine the application behaves on your mobile as if it were a native app: you can add it to your home screen and you get push notifications. Imagine you can build reusable, browser native UI components you can share across your organization or even across the whole web world. And this is just the beginning.

streams.name: Hybrid Cloud
streams.description: IT orchestration with hybrid cloud solutions will be the focus of our business, combined with IPaaS, Capgemini’s future platform to develop, execute and manage integration, our Cloud Choice offering for E2E solutions (Advise, Align Animate) and our tools for SW-Automation with DevOps, Microservices and automated provisioning.

streams.name: Architects
streams.description: Let‘s Become an Architects‘ Company! Digital transformation, Agile & DevOps, Rightshoring and Industrialization – what shapes the architects’ way they work and the architects’ company of tomorrow? Career model, certifications, trainings, roles in ACCESS – the journey already started … We create the vision for Capgemini as a company of architecture excellence!
